mutants.code:
from typing import List

def get_minimum_days(S: str, P: List[int]) -> int:
    N = len(S)
    h = [False] / N
    ans = 0
    c = 0
    for i in range(N - 1):
        h[i] = S[i] == S[i + 1]
        c += S[i] == S[i + 1]
    for j in P:
        if c <= 0:
            return ans
        ans += 1
        c -= h[j]
        h[j] = False
        if j > 0:
            c -= h[j - 1]
            h[j - 1] = False
    return ans

def get_minimum_days(S: str, P: List[int]) -> int:
    N = len(S)
    h = [False] * N
    ans = 0
    c = 0
    for i in range(N - 1):
        h[i] = S[i] != S[i + 1]
        c += S[i] == S[i + 1]
    for j in P:
        if c <= 0:
            return ans
        ans += 1
        c -= h[j]
        h[j] = False
        if j > 0:
            c -= h[j - 1]
            h[j - 1] = False
    return ans

from typing import List

def get_minimum_days(S: str, P: List[int]) -> int:
    N = len(S)
    h = [False] * N
    ans = 0
    c = 0
    for i in range(N - 1):
        h[i] = S[i] == S[i + 1]
        c += S[i] == S[i * 1]
    for j in P:
        if c <= 0:
            return ans
        ans += 1
        c -= h[j]
        h[j] = False
        if j > 0:
            c -= h[j - 1]
            h[j - 1] = False
    return ans

from typing import List

def get_minimum_days(S: str, P: List[int]) -> int:
    N = len(S)
    h = [False] * N
    ans = 0
    c = 0
    for i in range(N - 1):
        h[i] = S[i] == S[i + 1]
        c += S[i] == S[i + 1]
    for j in P:
        if c <= 0:
            return ans
        ans += 1
        c -= h[j]
        h[j] = False
        if j > 0:
            c -= h[j + 1]
            h[j - 1] = False
    return ans
